channel.title: Bloodline Choice
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Bloodline Choice" - Which bloodline is easier to get in a week?

item.title: Re: Bloodline Choice
item.content:encoded:
Eye of the storm.BN allies are a pain to get.Then you have to finish shift manager of DOOM!

I already answered this question in anotehr one of your threads.No point making duplicates.

item.title: Bloodline Choice [Urgent!]
item.content:encoded:
Alright, so I have a week left before I start getting Stamina cuts due to my loop cap, and most of the preparations for my run are complete. The only big problem is that I only have 3 bloodlines, and need one more.

As it stands, I cannot obtain the Trade due to my Loop Lock, and am already pissed off about losing the Note Pages I had saved up in orer to do so. So that's out.

I have only just started Burgerninja- Have one edible item, don't have Cici yet…But Greass seems like the easier one to get, especially when…

On the other hand, I could go for Eye of the Storm- However, I only unlocked the Inner Wastelands today.

So which is more likely to happen?
